Project.name: Login Demo for Java J2ME
Project.Description: This demo illustrates the use of the PureMVC framework within Java ME. It is a simple application that displays a splash screen, login screen and main screen.
Project.ReleaseNotes:
Features in Version 1.0
  • This example can be used as the basis to any mobile Java project.
  • Currently the application uses version 0.2 of the PureMVC Standard Version for Java.
Project.Installation:
Prerequisites You must have a wireless toolkit
  • Sun Java Wireless Toolkit 2.5.2 for CLDC
  • Sprint Wireless Toolkit
Installing the Project Source Code From the archive
  • Download the latest source code archive
  • Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk. For instance:
    • c:\development\
  • You will see a Login_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder. For instance:
c:\development\Login_X_Y From the Repository
  • Use your favorite SVN client to retrieve the latest source code release from the repository.
